FMGameRules.Desc1: Fortune Mouse is a 3-reel, 3-row video slot featuring respins until win.

Desc2.value: The game is played with 5 bet lines (fixed), bet level of %{minBetMtp} to %{maxBetMtp} and bet size of %{minChip} to %{maxChip}.
Desc2.comment: %{minBetMtp}, %{maxBetMtp}, %{minChip}, %{maxChip} will be replaced with game specific configurations.
Desc2.example: The game is played with 5 bet lines (fixed), bet level of 1 to 10 and bet size of 0.01 to 10.

FMCommonRules.Desc1: Wild symbol substitutes for all symbols.

FMFeature.Title: Fortune Mouse Feature
FMFeature.Desc1: During any spin, 3 Wild symbols may be added to the middle reel while the reels are spinning.
FMFeature.Desc2: The first and third reel will respin until there is a win.

FMMaxWin.Title: Maximum Win
FMMaxWin.Desc1: When Wild symbols occupy all of the reels, 1000x of the total bet amount is awarded.
